resources.string: From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth Low Energy devices. \n\nThis is because Bluetooth LE beacons, for example iBeacons or Eddystone, may be used to determine the phone\'s and user\'s location. We will not use this information in any way.
The Bluetooth adapter is turned off. Click the button below to enable it.
The app needs access to the Camera to scan the QR code.
This app needs access to your Storage in order to read the local QR code.\n We will not use this information in any way.
